name: Gender Equality Champions
title: High Gender Equality Rating
description: In 2019, Moldova achieved a gender equality rating of 4.5 out of 6, indicating significant progress towards gender parity.

name: Shipping Struggles
title: Low Liner Shipping Connectivity
description: As of 2020, Moldova's liner shipping connectivity index was 0.635, reflecting limited integration into global shipping networks.

name: Import Delays
title: Long Lead Time to Import
description: In 2016, the median lead time to import goods into Moldova was 32 days, highlighting logistical challenges.

name: Safety Concerns
title: High Mortality from Unintentional Poisoning
description: In 2021, Moldova reported a mortality rate of 4.15 per 100,000 due to unintentional poisoning, with males at a higher rate of 6.71.

name: Income Equality Efforts
title: Fair Income Distribution
description: In 2022, the lowest 10% of Moldova's population held 4.5% of the income, indicating efforts towards income equality.

name: Female Workforce Leaders
title: High Female Labor Force Participation
description: By 2024, women made up 54.7% of Moldova's labor force, showcasing strong female participation in the workforce.

name: Limited Female Employers
title: Low Percentage of Female Employers
description: In 2023, only 7.97% of female employment in Moldova was in employer roles, indicating room for growth in female entrepreneurship.

name: Unemployment Benefit Gaps
title: Minimal Unemployment Benefits for the Richest
description: In 2017, only 0.027% of Moldova's richest quintile received unemployment benefits, highlighting gaps in social safety nets.

name: Port Traffic Challenges
title: Low Container Port Traffic
description: In 2019, Moldova's container port traffic was 818 TEUs, reflecting limited port activity.
